post.title: ARNEIS project journal - dev-cw01
post.content:
Welcome to our weekly status report of the ARNEIS project!

This is the first post of a regularly weekly series which I plan to publish ad the end of each weekly sprint of the ARNEIS project.

As I announced in a previous post

Your team “B-AROL-O Bottling Systems” and project “ARNEIS: Automated Recognizer, Network-Enabled, Items Sorter” have been selected as one of just 50 teams to move on to Phase 2 of OpenCV Spatial AI Contest. Your team name and region are listed on the official webpage at https://opencv.org/opencv-spatial-ai-contest/​

Now is the time for us to work on Phase 2 of the project to put into use the gifts kindly offered by the project sponsors:

  • 500 hours of Microsoft Azure training on Intel's D32ds v4 hardware
  • Up to 3 OpenCV AI Kit (OAK-D-LITE) Devices
  • Up to $400 in LEGO bricks to build your project
  • Access to Intel® DevCloud
